description: This file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' providing a method for splitting a string into tokens based on spaces, and storing the tokens in a linked list. It also contains private helper methods for validation and addition of tokens.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A Kotlin object providing utility methods for string splitting and token validation.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the source string into tokens separated by spaces and returns a linked list of tokens.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if the token is valid, currently ensuring it is not empty.
